divs: Sighting Detailsme and a friend where doin x-mas lights with my room mate when my buddy seen it in the sky he yelled at me to look i seen it then i yelled at my room mate to look an then he saw it we all then went dead quit an could not hear a thing but see this thing fly over us an it was so low there was no clouds in the sky it was a nice night out an you could see the stars it did not take to long for the thing to fly over us be for it was gona an we could not see it any more i thought that it was a hang glider but it was to low an to drak for any one to be hang gliding i think that all of us where in shock an could not belive what we just saw
trends: There has been one other sighting in Evans
There were no other sightings in Evans on or around November 28th 2011
